title: Camila Cabello gives Emilia Clarke the perfect Game Of Thrones pressie
text:
Emilia Clarke received a gift from Camila Cabello (Picture: BBC)

Camila Cabello gave Emilia Clarke the perfect Game Of Thrones themed present.

Superfan Camila fangirls over the Daenerys Targaryen actress when they meet on The Graham Norton Show.

After performing her single Liar, she uses the opportunity to give Emilia a gift and tell her how much she loves the show, which ended earlier this year.

Meeting her on the Graham Norton sofa, she gives Emilia a tiny dragon, a spot on present for the Mother of dragons herself.

The singer reveals: ‘I am the biggest Game of Thrones fan in the entire world. I am just freaking out to meet you guys. I literally went through all eight seasons in a month this year.’

Wonder what she made of that controversial final season?

Emilia is also reunited with her former co-star Jason Momoa, who played Daenerys’ lover Khal Drogo.

Game Of Thrones superfan Camila fangirled over Emilia (Picture: BBC)

In season one Daenerys and Drogo fell madly in love, but it was cut brutally short when a festering arrow wound caused Drogo to fall into a coma.

The Mother of Dragons didn’t fare much better in the end, as she was murdered by her lover Jon Snow (Kit Harington), who feared she would become a tyrant if she took the Iron Throne.

The actress was reunited with her former co-star Jason Momoa (Picture: BBC)

Meanwhile Jason appears on the show to talk about his new TV series See and the possibility of a sequel to Aquaman.

He reveals on the show: ‘We will be back – probably in a year from now. I was very excited about the reaction. We have a script, which we’ve pitched and I’ m very passionate about it.’

The Graham Norton Show airs tonight 10.35pm on BBC One.
